text.text_translated:
Building bridges is one of the biggest transportation jobs. These jobs cost a lot of money. Bridges are very important links. They carry cars, trucks, and trains. They go over water, mountains, or other roads.
Civil engineering is the job of building big things, like roads and bridges. Bridges are one of the most important parts of this job. It is a very big problem when a bridge falls down. For this reason, experts must check every part of the bridge for problems.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Building bridges is one of the biggest transportation jobs. These jobs cost a lot of money. Bridges are very important links. They carry cars, trucks, and trains. They go over water, mountains, or other roads.

Civil engineering is the job of making and building big things, like roads and bridges. Bridges are a very important part of this job. So, people check them very carefully for problems. This is very important because sometimes a bridge falls down.
